mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, address_id, creat_time, finish_time, price, is_finished) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isFinished,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_finished = #{isFinished,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, address_id, creat_time, finish_time, price, is_finished from order
